omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
select distinct
				apc.NHSNumber,
				apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
				cc.CriticalCareStartDate as MeasurementDate,
				coalesce(cc.CriticalCareStartTime, '00:00:00') as MeasurementDateTime,
				cc.GestationLengthAtDelivery as ValueAsNumber
		from omop_staging.sus_CCMDS cc 
		inner join omop_staging.sus_APC apc on cc.GeneratedRecordID = apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier
		where apc.NHSNumber is not null
		and cc.GestationLengthAtDelivery is not null

		from omop_staging.sus_CCMDS cc 
		inner join omop_staging.sus_APC apc on cc.GeneratedRecordID = apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier
		where apc.NHSNumber is not null
		and cc.GestationLengthAtDelivery is not null

omopColumns.name: measurement_datetime
omopColumns.operation_description: Combines a date with a time of day.

dataSource.name: MeasurementDateTime
dataSource.description: Start time of the Measurement, if exists, else midnight.

omopColumns.query:
select distinct
				apc.NHSNumber,
				apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
				cc.CriticalCareStartDate as MeasurementDate,
				coalesce(cc.CriticalCareStartTime, '00:00:00') as MeasurementDateTime,
				cc.GestationLengthAtDelivery as ValueAsNumber
		from omop_staging.sus_CCMDS cc 
		inner join omop_staging.sus_APC apc on cc.GeneratedRecordID = apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier
		where apc.NHSNumber is not null
		and cc.GestationLengthAtDelivery is not null

omopColumns.name: measurement_type_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `32828`. EHR episode record

omopColumns.name: measurement_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `4260747`. Length of gestation at birth

omopColumns.name: value_as_number

dataSource.name: ValueAsNumber
dataSource.description: Value of the Length of Gestation at Delivery

omopColumns.query:
select distinct
				apc.NHSNumber,
				apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
				cc.CriticalCareStartDate as MeasurementDate,
				coalesce(cc.CriticalCareStartTime, '00:00:00') as MeasurementDateTime,
				cc.GestationLengthAtDelivery as ValueAsNumber
		from omop_staging.sus_CCMDS cc 
		inner join omop_staging.sus_APC apc on cc.GeneratedRecordID = apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier
		where apc.NHSNumber is not null
		and cc.GestationLengthAtDelivery is not null

omopColumns.name: RecordConnectionIdentifier

dataSource.name: GeneratedRecordIdentifier
dataSource.description: CDS specific identifier that binds multiple CDS messages together.

omopColumns.query:
select distinct
				apc.NHSNumber,
				apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
				cc.CriticalCareStartDate as MeasurementDate,
				coalesce(cc.CriticalCareStartTime, '00:00:00') as MeasurementDateTime,
				cc.GestationLengthAtDelivery as ValueAsNumber
		from omop_staging.sus_CCMDS cc 
		inner join omop_staging.sus_APC apc on cc.GeneratedRecordID = apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier
		where apc.NHSNumber is not null
		and cc.GestationLengthAtDelivery is not null
